text: Na'ankure zahoko'atu knafima ventemo'ma umani kumamo'a knarera osu'ne. Rama'amo'za mago'zamarimpa hu'za, knarekita vugahune hu'naze. Zamagesama antahi'zana Foniksi uhanatigahune hu'za antahi'naze. Kritima ventemo'ma unemania kumamo'a rugaruga asoparega zage ufre kaziga (notwest sautwest) avugosa hunte'negeno zaho ko atu knafina anante umanigahune hu'naze.
